name: Verify Installed apps details info via UI
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- Shell app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Click `Installed Apps` button.
- Click `Details` button on installed app container.

### Verify that:

- Shell app Details info is valid.
descriptionHtml:

  • Shell app installed.

Steps:
